# Ministrify

> Ministrify is a free Ukrainian church management platform (ChMS) for churches of all sizes. Available at https://ministrify.app

Ministrify is a modern, cloud-based church management system built specifically for Ukrainian-speaking churches. It provides a comprehensive set of tools to manage all aspects of church life in one place.

## Key Features

- **People Management**: Member database with profiles, family relationships, tags, roles, and shepherding
- **Events & Calendar**: Event scheduling, public event pages, attendance tracking, Google Calendar sync, QR check-in
- **Ministry Teams**: Team management with positions, roles, rotation scheduling, and volunteer coordination
- **Small Groups**: Group management with leaders, meetings, attendance, and join requests
- **Financial Management**: Income/expense tracking, multi-currency support, Monobank & PrivatBank integration, LiqPay donations
- **Online Donations**: Public donation pages with LiqPay and Monobank payment processing
- **Telegram Bot**: Notifications, broadcasts, two-way messaging with church members
- **Website Builder**: Public church websites with customizable templates, blog, sermons, gallery, FAQ, testimonials
- **Worship Planning**: Song library, setlists, worship team scheduling, music stand mode
- **Service Planning**: Drag-and-drop service order builder with templates and team assignments
- **Kanban Boards**: Task and project management for church teams
- **Reports & Analytics**: Attendance trends, financial reports, volunteer statistics
- **Permissions System**: Role-based access control with customizable permissions per role

## Technical Details

- Built with Laravel, Blade, Alpine.js, Tailwind CSS
- Multi-tenant architecture (church_id based)
- Ukrainian and Russian language interface
- Available for all churches
- Hosted at https://ministrify.app

## Target Audience

- Ukrainian churches and religious communities
- Church pastors, administrators, and ministry leaders
- Churches looking for a free, Ukrainian-language church management solution

## Comparisons

Ministrify is comparable to Planning Center, ChurchTools, Breeze, and Elvanto, but is:
- Available for all churches, no restrictions on team size
- Built for Ukrainian churches with native Ukrainian/Russian language support
- Integrated with Ukrainian payment systems (LiqPay, Monobank, PrivatBank)
- Includes Telegram bot integration (widely used in Ukraine)
